attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: House owners should not be forced to sell their homes to cover care costs when they are no longer able to care for themselves. They have worked all their lives to pay for their home and are unfairly discriminated against as opposed to people that have not made the sacrifices to purchase their own homes.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
